00020 #define kModulus 103
00021 #define kSetA 1
00022 #define kSetB 2
00023 #define kSetC 3
00024 #define kASCII "ascii"
00025 #define kStop "2331112"
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 using namespace rapidxml;
00029 
00030 Code128::Code128( string *data )
00031 {
00032         checkCharList = new vector< int >;
00033         BaseBarcode::setCheckcharModulus( kModulus );
00034         filename = "Base128.xml";
00035         parsed_xml.parse< 0 >( getXMLToParse( &filename ) );
00036         setDataLength( -1 ); //variable length symbol
00037         //verify
00038         if ( verifyData( data ) )
00039         {
00040                 //data
00041                 encodeSymbol( data );
00042                 //get Set for first character
00043                 vector< int > *startpattern;
00044                 Symbol *startSymbol;
00045                 //dynamic start symbol creation
00046                 switch ( getSet( data->at( 0 ) ) ) 
00047                 {
00048                         case kSetA:
00049                                 startpattern = stringToVector( "211412" );
00050                                 startSymbol = createSymbol( 4, 1, 1, 0, startpattern );
00051                                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( startSymbol, 0 );
00052                                 checkCharList->insert( checkCharList->begin( ) , 103 );
00053                                 break;
00054                         case kSetB:
00055                                 startpattern = stringToVector( "211214" );
00056                                 startSymbol = createSymbol( 4, 1, 1, 0, startpattern );
00057                                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( startSymbol, 0 );
00058                                 checkCharList->insert( checkCharList->begin( ) , 104 );
00059                                 break;
00060                         case kSetC:
00061                                 startpattern = stringToVector( "211232" );
00062                                 startSymbol = createSymbol( 4, 1, 1, 0, startpattern );
00063                                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( startSymbol, 0 );
00064                                 checkCharList->insert( checkCharList->begin( ) , 105 );
00065                                 break;
00066                         default:
00067                                 break;
00068                 }
00069                 //check char
00070                 encodeCheckCharacter( data );
00071                 //start/stop
00072                 encodeStartStop( );
00073                 //quiet zones
00074                 encodeQuietZones( ); 
00075         }
00076         else 
00077         {
00078                 cerr << "Data verification failed" << endl;
00079         }
00080 }

00083 Code128::~Code128( )
00084 {
00085         checkCharList = NULL;
00086         delete checkCharList;
00087 }

00090 int Code128::getSet( char first )
00091 {
00092         string firstBit = kASCII;
00093         string secondBit;
00094         stringstream ccout;
00095         ccout << ( int )first;
00096         secondBit = ccout.str( );
00097         ccout.flush( );
00098         firstBit.append( secondBit );
00099         xml_node< > *firstNode = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( "data_encoding" )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( "A" );
00100         string returnedData = firstNode->value( );
00101         if ( returnedData == "nil" ) 
00102         {
00103                 firstNode = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( "data_encoding" )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( "B" );
00104                 returnedData = firstNode->value( );
00105                 if ( returnedData == "nil" ) 
00106                 {
00107                         return kSetC;
00108                 }
00109                 return kSetB; 
00110         }
00111         return kSetA;
00112 }

00114 
00115 bool Code128::verifyContent ( const string *content )
00116 {
00117         for ( int nn = 0; nn < content->length( ); nn++ ) 
00118         {
00119                 char testChar = content->at( nn );
00120                 if ( ( int )testChar < 0 && ( int )testChar > 127 ) 
00121                 {
00122                         cerr << "You are trying to encode " << content->at( nn ) << " which is not supported by this barcode type." << endl;
00123                         return false;
00124                 }
00125         }
00126         return true;   
00127 }

00130 void Code128::encodeStartStop ( )
00131 {       
00132         vector< int > *stoppattern = stringToVector( kStop );
00133         Symbol *stopSymbol = createSymbol( 4, 1, 1, 0, stoppattern );
00134         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( stopSymbol, BaseBarcode::encodedSymbols.size( ) );
00135 }

00138 void Code128::encodeQuietZones ( )
00139 {
00140         string returnedData;
00141         xml_node< > *node = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( "non_data_encoding" )->first_node( "quietzone_left" )->first_node( "A" );
00142         returnedData = node->value( );
00143         
00144         int width = atoi( returnedData.c_str( ) );
00145         vector< int > *pattern = new vector< int >;
00146         pattern->push_back( width );
00147         
00148         Symbol *quietSymbol = createSymbol( 2, 1, 1, 0, pattern );
00149         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( quietSymbol, 0 );
00150         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( quietSymbol, BaseBarcode::encodedSymbols.size( ) );
00151 }

00154 void Code128::encodeCheckCharacter ( const string *data )
00155 {
00156         xml_node< > *node = NULL;
00157         vector< int > *pattern = NULL;
00158         int accumulator = checkCharList->at( 0 );
00159         //loop through the vector of ascii values....
00160         for ( int rr = 1; rr < checkCharList->size( ); rr++ ) 
00161         {
00162                 accumulator = accumulator + ( checkCharList->at( rr ) * ( rr ) );
00163         }
00164         
00165         int modulus = accumulator % 103;
00166         
00167         string firstBit = kASCII;
00168         string secondBit;
00169         stringstream ccout;
00170         ccout << modulus;
00171         secondBit = ccout.str( );
00172         ccout.flush( );
00173         firstBit.append( secondBit );
00174         
00175         node = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( "data_encoding" )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( "A" );
00176         string returnedData = node->value( );
00177         if ( returnedData == "nil" ) 
00178         {
00179                 node = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( "data_encoding" )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( "B" );
00180                 returnedData = node->value( );
00181         } 
00182         
00183         pattern = stringToVector( returnedData );
00184         Symbol *aSymbol = createSymbol( 1, 1, 1, 0, pattern ); 
00185         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( aSymbol, BaseBarcode::encodedSymbols.size( ) );
00186         
00187         delete pattern;
00188 }

00197 vector< int >* Code128::stringToVector( string aString )
00198 {
00199         vector< int > *pattern = new vector< int >;
00200         for ( int ll = 0; ll < aString.length( ) ; ll++ )
00201         {
00202                 char eachCharFromResult = aString.at( ll );
00203                 int temp = atoi( &eachCharFromResult );
00204                 pattern->push_back( temp );
00205         }
00206         return pattern;
00207 }
